main event: Two silver-colored wheel-shaped objects were observed in Gatlinburg, Tennessee on September 23, 1954.
interesting points: The objects were bright in color and flew in a straight flight path from north to south., The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes., The objects were observed via ground visual method., Attention was attracted to the objects by reflection., Both objects were described as being behind one another in formation.
witness description: two civilian witnesses, including a 73-year-old housewife
